item.content:encoded: Hi Mike, I plan on doing precisely that.

item.title: By: Mike
item.dc:creator: Mike
item.description: Nice post for those who have been struggling with this. Any chance you would consider doing a post of this sort of step by step nature with regards to mathematical induction? I know that at least a few people have been finding it difficult to properly grasp the concept, and would likely find it helpful.
item.content:encoded: Nice post for those who have been struggling with this. Any chance you would consider doing a post of this sort of step by step nature with regards to mathematical induction? I know that at least a few people have been finding it difficult to properly grasp the concept, and would likely find it helpful.
